ygData.subject: Re: Armor
ygData.msgSnippet: LOL Now THATS funny! BAHAHAHA Grukklukk rofl man I HATE farming, camping, loot-stealing SOBS They worse than hacking, bashing life-stealing MOBS In Grukks
ygData.messageBody:
LOL
Now THATS funny!
BAHAHAHA Grukklukk rofl
man I HATE farming, camping, loot-stealing SOBS
They worse than hacking, bashing life-stealing MOBS
In Grukks humble opinion :)

-----Original Message-----
From: James Schuldes [mailto:jgs@...]
Sent: Thursday, May 27, 1999 10:37 AM
To: 'warriors_eq@onelist.com'
Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Armor


From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>

"You have ruined your own game.... You'll not ruin ours!!!!"

<g>

-----Original Message-----
From: Jason Coan [mailto:COANJ@...]
Sent: Thursday, May 27, 1999 10:42 AM
To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Armor

From: "Jason Coan" <COANJ@...>

I simply expect people not to FARM items.....greedy
bastards.

Well, I'm going to remove myself from the list. I don't
care to be on a list where we have people activly encouraging people to be
dicks and to activly prevent people who need items and are willing work for
items, to be pushed aside by high level ass holes farming equipment for
their low level buddies.

And for the guy who accused me of flaming, this is a flame
:) Its power gaming greedy bastard ass holes like Jim that are and will
continue to ruin this game for everybody.

Bye all, was fun, happy hunting all

(btw, I hope a griffin kills you Jim then camps on your body
for days until it and all your twinked equipment goes poof)

>>> "Jim Peterson" <jim@...> 5.27.99 10:31:40 AM
>>>
From: "Jim Peterson" <jim@...>

Then beat us to it. Geez, what do you expect? What did I
just say? We
can't get it if you do more damage. We have to win the spot
quite a bit.
